item.description:
We are going to celebrate the 4th with a traverse of Hale, Zealand, and the Bonds.

The plan is to meet at 7:15 AM at the parking aread for the North Twin trail at the end of Haystack Rd and be on the trail at 7:30 AM sharp. We will have already done a car spot Sat night.

Dogs are Welcome!

This hike is best for hikers who can hike faster than booktime for extend distances with limited short breaks. It is expected that participants will hike or trail run at their own pace and regroup at several pre-identified spots along the way.

This hike is @ 22 miles in distance and summits 5 of the NH48 peaks. Book time is @ 12 - 13 hours. We hope to finish in @ 11 hours. Stops will be short. We will refill water at the Zealsnd Hut, but you may want to bring along extra water or a filter.

Please check your maps and AMC White Mountain Guide for a description of the peak/trails. Please feel free to contact us with any questions you may have.


As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.name: Hale-Zealand-Bonds Traverse
